item.name: account_exists
item.message: There is already an newsletter account with the same E-Mail address registered

item.name: account_not_exists
item.message: For the stated E-mail address is no newsletter account registered

item.name: action_description
item.message: Please select, what you want to do with this newsletter.

item.name: activate_error
item.message: While activating the newsletter account an error has occured.

item.name: activate_success
item.message: The newsletter account was successfully activated and can now be used.

item.name: compose_error
item.message: While sending the newsletter an error has occured.

item.name: confirm_delete
item.message: Do you really want to delete the marked newsletter accounts?

item.name: confirm_archive_delete
item.message: Do you really want to delete the marked newsletters?

item.name: delete_archive_error
item.message: While deleting the marked newsletters an error has occured.

item.name: delete_archive_success
item.message: The marked newsletters have been deleted successfully.

item.name: delete_error
item.message: While deleting the marked newsletter accounts an error has occured.

item.name: delete_success
item.message: The marked newsletter accounts have been deleted successfully.

item.name: edit_error
item.message: While editing the newsletter settings an error has occured.

item.name: edit_success
item.message: The newsletter settings were successfully edited.

item.name: mod_description
item.message: This module is responsible for the newsletter.

item.name: subject_to_short
item.message: The subject should be at least 3 characters long

item.name: subscribe_error
item.message: While creating your newsletter account an error has occured.

item.name: subscribe_mail_body
item.message: You successfully subscribed with your E-mail address {mail} to the newsletter of {title} ({host}). To complete the registration process, please click on the hyperlink below. If you haven\'t subscribed this newsletter, please ignore or delete this E-mail.

item.name: subscribe_success
item.message: The newsletter account has been successfully created.

item.name: test_nl_description
item.message: Will only be send to the E-mail adress which is stated in the newsletter settings

item.name: text_to_short
item.message: The text should be at least 3 characters long

item.name: unsubscribe_error
item.message: While deleting the newsletter account an error has occured.

item.name: unsubscribe_success
item.message: The newsletter account was successfully deleted.
